attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to call an immediate general election because the Labour Government has broken its manifesto promises and lost public trust. People are struggling with rising living costs, failing public services, and poor leadership. A general election is needed to give the public a voice and restore confidence in our democracy.
attributes.background: The Labour Government has broken key manifesto promises and failed to act in the public’s best interests. The people deserve a say on the country’s leadership. To restore trust and accountability, a general election must be held now.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
